title: Kojima and Xbox Deal Incoming? - Kinda Funny Games Daily 04.08.21
description: Greg and Tim talk about Jeffy Grubb Grubb's rumor that Hideo #Kojima and #Xbox are teaming up, #Outriders giving you a free legendary, and #Deathloop's delay.
itunes:author: Kinda Funny
